last_phrase: In conclusion, it is clear that understanding the language of the philosophers of alchemy is no easy task. It is important to look beyond the literal meaning of their writings and decipher the hidden secrets and symbolism. Therefore, one must approach the study of alchemy with an open mind and a willingness to unravel the mysteries that lie within.
